reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater wonderfully soft and appreciate its nice fit that's not too baggy. Customers like its style, with one mentioning it can be dressed up or down, and they appreciate its colors, with one noting it works well with various pants.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and easy to style
items.body: This knit sweater looks cute and it's material is very comfortable and soft. Super light weight and loose and perfect for fall. There's many colors that it comes in so you can style it pretty easily with what you already own. There's also no bad smell or anything, and It fits well- not snug but not oversized. I will be buying more so I highly recommend this as a good basic to have. Read more
items.author: Boba Ceo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky Feel & OH SO COMFY!
items.body: This V-neck sweater has such a luxurious feel to it - it's almost silky! It is soooo soft & comfy against the skin. It's not at all clingy. It drapes beautifully. I bought my usual size, large, & it has a loose-ish but not baggy fit. I'm 5'9" & 160 lbs. Per the sweater's size chart, I should have ordered a medium but I didn't want a close fit. At $19.99, this sweater is a steal! I'm thinking of getting more colors. I haven't laundered it yet but will update this review if machine washing & drying goes horribly wrong. Instructions are to dry flat but hey, life's too short. I'm very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Lilydune

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but runs small
items.body: This is soft and looks as expected. Love the brown. It runs small though. I had to go up a size and it‚Äôs still not very roomy, but roomy enough to keep. I like stuff a little loose and long. Read more
items.author: Laura M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, SOFT; nice look, excellent price! Size Large is roomy.
items.body: Well made, SOFT expensive-look & feel fabric! Nice look, excellent price! I am 150 lbs., 5'5", 36C, so got size Large because I like looseness; Large is roomy, a little boxy; I guess I could have got a medium. The V-neck is roomy so I may wear a cami underneath--or not. I got the color "Manue" which is a rich deep coppery-brown-slightly red; such a beautiful color! Would look wonderful on redheads, auburns, brunettes, etc. Package came Very Quickly in mail. Thank you! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large
items.body: Very nice sweater. Perfect, lightweight. Read more
items.author: HLC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pills badly
items.body: Lovely soft sweater but pills badly after few wearings. Read more
items.author: CrystalFan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have several!!
items.body: I have several of these. They are loose fit and do well either by themselves or with a shirt underneath so they are great for travel. Super soft and comfy. The only negative is that they will pill a bit with wear and washing. Good value. Read more
items.author: pb

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Additional information
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by this sweater when I got it. Love the feel of the fabric. Sleeves are actually a bit long and snug at the wrist. Nice touch. Feels cozy. Feels of high quality. I did return it for the next larger size, as I wanted it just a bit more loose in the middle. I have a big belly. Size runs a bit small. I received the 3XL , it was exactly the same size as the 2XL! I had them both to physically compare and measure. So, so disappointed üòû‚òπÔ∏è. Now, I have to send this one back too. üò´. So, not only do they run small, but you may actually find absolutely no difference between the sizes! Not a happy customer. Read more
items.author: lisa simmons

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Grey, Glass Alpaca Red, Hx Red, Qw Brown, Orange, Glass Elk Red, Hua Coffee, Christma-green, Hy Blue, Black Love, Hua Purple, Royal Blue, Glass Elk Black, Christmas Snowman. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
